name: Carpenter
description: A woodworker crafting furniture and structures; adventurers can commission custom items, learn woodworking skills, or find hidden compartments in furniture.
atmosphere: The workshop is filled with the rich scent of fresh-cut wood and the sharp tang of sawdust. The sound of saws cutting, hammers striking, and planes smoothing wood creates a rhythmic, industrious background. Stacks of lumber and half-finished projects line the space, while the air carries the promise of creation and craftsmanship.
